DOC.brief_summary: This project seek develop comprehensive , computer-based education program primary care physician improve skill structure substance abuse screening , brief intervention , referral treatment ( SBIRT ) . The investigator develop two online education program base virtual patient ( VP ) technology . One program include five typical , interactive , problem-solving VPs second include five identical VPs except two VPs `` work '' substance abuse expert present case study . The remain three VPs `` unworked '' ( typical VPs ) . The investigator hypothesize education program significantly improve educational outcome , compare training , measure validate survey tool . A secondary hypothesis physician use `` work '' ( guide learning ) program achieve similar educational result use typical VP approach , require less training time .
